modName: Highpond Citadel - An Apocrypha Player Home - DELETED
summary: Highpond Citadel is a medium sized player owned area residing in Apocrypha. See the full description for more details.
descriptionHtml:
[img] https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-s2qNEDCn4mo/UNzj-pNYEAI/AAAAAAAAAo4/m34KKqctedk/s800/dmcline.png [/img]

This player home is accessible through a standing stone in Solstheim. The stone is in a temple on an island near the Standing Stone next to Raven Rock. Activate the stone and it will teleport you to the home. Once inside the home, you will find all of the essentials, crafting stations, a place to sleep, and storage. The player home is in Apocrypha, only accessible to the Dragonborn, so it is not follower compatible. Inside you will also find a spell in the mage\'s section of the home, which will teleport you to the home from anywhere in the game for easy access. If you have any questions please leave a comment. [b][u]This mod requires Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLC, as well as the newest Skyrim update.[/u][/b]

Sorry about the screenshot quality, I don\'t have the best machine for Skyrim.
author: dmcthunder999
